item.title: Plain HTML is a dangerous language for M$?
item.description: Information from securityfocus.com, people found a bug in M$ product, it crashes Outlook, Frontpage, and all the Microsoft programs that use the shlwapi.dll library to render web code. You might click here for test and details in Chinese....

item.title: Draft Charter
item.description: Our goals "Free software'' is a matter of liberty, not price. To understand the concept, you should think of "free'' as in "free speech,'' not as in "free beer.'' Free software is a matter of the users' freedom to run,...

item.title: 妨害電腦使用 將處徒刑
item.description: 製作病毒程式或以電子郵件灌爆別人信箱 受刑法規範 記者宮能慧／台北報導 立法院司法委員會昨 (24)日初審通過刑法部分條文修正草案，增訂妨害電腦使用罪專章，未來製作電腦病毒程式導致他人損害，可處五年以下有期徒刑，或科或併科新台幣20萬元以下罰金，無故以電子郵件灌爆別人信箱，可處三年以下有期徒刑，或科或併科10萬元以下罰金。...

item.title: Taiwan copyright laws seen as unreasonable
item.description: Taiwan News, Staff Reporter / By Lisa Wang Student groups yesterday voiced strong opposition to the ongoing revision of the country's copyright laws, saying that some of the major amendments were unreasonable and that the government was simply acting under...

item.title: New members
item.description: 本週新進會員有一位老師及三位同學，名單如下(依加入先後排列): 1. Christ 2. Hazel 3. Grace 4. May 盼了好久，我們終於湊齊人數了。 :-) 下一步: 發起人會議，訂定章程。 原則上找課外時間，但這週末四年級同學有畢業旅行，因此不知道各位方不方便在週三到週五內找一天下課後討論。...

item.title: Picture of level 2 reading class
item.description: Reading Class 全體師生(好像有缺了誰...)...

item.title: 為什麼要自由軟體?
item.description: Why Free Software? 這個世界上多少人為了自由而戰, 為了自由而死; 中國有句話說: 不自由, 毋寧死 這個問題簡單的想就是你(妳)想不想要"自由"? 我想你(妳)該不會給回答說不想要吧?...

item.title: 留住訪客, 從掃除路障做起
item.description: 來自軟體自由協會 slat-talk mailing list 上的討論, 積丹尼老兄覺得咱們氣象局的網站越來越依靠微軟牌瀏覽器, 原本該給大眾一個方便查詢的工具, 卻變得如此複雜易瀏覽失敗。See www.anybrowser.org for lessons....

item.title: Free Software Club is starting from now!
item.description: We are going to start a Free Software Club in YMCA. To be a formal club of YMCA, we need at least five member to register it. For now, we have two members already. One of the members is an...
